content.prompt: In the ninth paragraph, the author makes which of the following claims about the early years of her writing career?

choices.label: She continued writing because encouragement outweighed doubts about her ability.
As she continued writing, her doubts about her ability steadily diminished.
She continued writing despite lacking confidence in her ability.
As she continued writing, she became increasingly skilled at managing her obsession.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
